messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Since we don't have a HoP at the moment come to me for any problems

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: For grand breaking and entry troy wisse is now an arrest on sight target, if he resists arrests (and is dangerous) deadly force is permitted

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to space-winter, a pack of wire eating mammals have stampeded into the place with all those juicy wires.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Whoever broke into my room and tried to take my shit is dead, also, you will die, grandtheft is a capital crime, and i don't see my gun

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Oh crap, get the mop.

Meaty ores have been detected on collision course with the station.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Before we board the shuttle or we all die, congratulations to helps the station who has been awarded a medal of valour for arrestign the detective who tried to kill me through welder bombing
